Imp Note:

After installing teracopy, to make it a pro version.follow the instruction :

1, Copy the Serial from 'Teracopy Pro 2.12  Serial.txt'

2, Open teracopy, click on 'more' button. there u will see  'Get Pro..' written on BLUE colour.

3, Just click.....it will show registration sucessfull.


Remember copy the serial first..... Enjoy...

IMP Note:

To make teracopy Pro..follow the instructions

1, Copy the Serial from \'Teracopy Pro 2.12  Serial.txt\' file

2, Open teracopy, click on \'more\'. then u will see \'Get Pro..\' written on BLUE colour..Click on that and it will show Sucessfully Registered.

Works just great no prob at all
